title: Letter to the University of Pennsylvania
abstract:
June 6, 2008
Robert R. Terrell, Esq. and Robert F. Firestone, Esq.
Associate General Counsels
University of Pennsylvania
133 South 36th Street - Suite 300
Philadelphia, PA 19104 
 
Via Email to robert.terrell@ogc.upenn.edu and robert.ﬁrestone@ogc.upenn.edu
Dear Sirs:
I am writing in reference to the JURIS Database, a database of public domain legal 
materials developed by the Air Force and then by the Department of Justice.  In 1998,
